title: New Zelda Project Being Worked On By Monolith Soft  - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.28.19
description:
Get your first refill pack free at http://getquip.com/games

Get your trial set at http://harrys.com/gamesdaily

Tim and Fran discuss Kaz Hirai's retirement, the next Zelda, From Software rumors, and more!

Time Codes - 
KFGD: 03.28.2019
00:03:45- Housekeeping
The Kinda Funny World Tour comes to Kansas City THIS Saturday. Come hang out with us all day at Planet Comicon for panels with the cast of Smallville, Mick Foley, and Henry Winkler! Then, come to our Meet & Greet at the Flying Saucer Draught Emporium! No badge needed for the Meet & Greet. NYC, you’re next on April 6th!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack, Tom Bock, and Mohammed Mohammed!
The Roper Report   -
00:05:55 - Kaz Hirai Finally Retiring (Brian Ashcroft at Kotaku)
00:13:19 - Monolith Soft Zelda (Joe Skrebels IGN)
00:30:11 - Minecraft Removes Mention of Notch (Luke Plunkett Kotaku)
00:32:33 - Get on the Hype Train, we are going to Rumors Town FromSofware Rumors from SpawnWaveMEdia backed up by Liam Robertson
00:37:10 - Out today
00:41:52 -  Quip
00:43:20 -  Harry’s
Reader mail   -
00:50:21 - With Cuphead releasing on Switch, what do you think the odds are of Rare Replay coming to Switch? - Steven
00:53:08 - What new games in the next few months are you gonna play? - Jacob B
00:57:23 - Squad Up: Bryan: @GarbageManGames / bryan@garbagemangames.com
00:58:13 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Fran and Imran Khan
